title: Part A
stimulusHtml:
1 point is earned if identifies x = -2 or x = 0

1 point is earned for answer with justification

f' changes from decreasing to increasing at x = -2 and from increasing to decreasing at x = 0. Therefore, the graph of f has points of inflections at x = -2 and x = 0.
